content.raw:
I'd like to add a test for this. We have a [library for getting memory info in gazebo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/534af30cc78997d0589571bd22ecea6f2c2e3ef8/test/performance/RAMLibrary.hh?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#RAMLibrary.hh-37), but it parses `/proc/meminfo` so it only works on Linux.

I think using [python's psutil library](http://stackoverflow.com/a/21632554) would be a more cross-platform approach, though it is an optional python package that must be installed.
